availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Mary Ellen Magher Travis (Louisville, Kentucky, resident)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, resident. Native of Ireland. Married to John Travis. Mother of Bridget Travis, Ellen “Nellie” Travis, Kate Travis, Mary Travis, and Julia Travis. Resident of Louisville in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 6, p. 385.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 9, p. 230A-B.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records – Microfilm (1852-1965), KDLA, Film #994027-994058: Jefferson County Births, 1855, p. 9 of 32 of microfilm.
Vital Statistics Original Death Certificates – Microfilm (1911-1965), KDLA, Film 7019168: All Counties, 1924-1929, File #14213, p. 1018 of 3309 of microfilm.
